name: Herma
greetingDialogue: Hi there! Are you the hairdresser?
positiveReaction: Thanks a lot! See you next time!

dialogues.text: One new predescribed haircut for me! Sorry, I'm excited. I just moved into the city! It's for work, but I enjoy it already.

responses.text: What kind of work do you do?

dialogues.text: I monitor vertical gardens. It's my dream job! I get to spend much time out in the open air and smelling nice flowers.

responses.text: I'm more of an animal person myself.

dialogues.text: Going from what I've already seen, yes! I love the designs of the vertical gardens. Maybe also because that's my job.

responses.text: I'm not really a plant person.

dialogues.text: That's why I'm excited. I really appreciate the efforts of the Party to contiue making cities more green.
The gardens are crawling with animals though! Birds, squirrels, mice and insects in every shape and color.
Actually, not like that. I monitor their biodiversity and health! I spend a lot of time with the garden personell though, they're nice!
They make our lives possible! It fascinates me. And also, they smell quite nice!
